verses.roman:
śuniyā prabhura ei madhura vacana
śacī-pāśa ācāryādi karila gamana

synonyms: śuniyā—hearing this; prabhura—of the Lord; ei—this; madhura—sweet; vacana—statement; śacī-pāśa—before mother Śacī; ācārya-ādi—Advaita Ācārya and other devotees; karila—did; gamana—going.
translation: After hearing Lord Caitanya's statement, all the devotees, headed by Advaita Ācārya, approached mother Śacī.
